code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={token:null,id:null};export var authSlice=createSlice({name:"auth",initialState:initialState,reducers:{getUserData:function getUserData(state,action){state.token=action.payload.token;state.id=action.payload.id;},signOut:function signOut(state){state.token=null;state.id=null;}}});var _authSlice$actions=authSlice.actions,getUserData=_authSlice$actions.getUserData,signOut=_authSlice$actions.signOut;export{getUserData,signOut};export var selectToken=function selectToken(state){return state.auth.token;};export var selectUser=function selectUser(state){return state.auth.id;};export default authSlice.reducer;
